description: Temporary change to payments for road schemes

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["The Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ) is live. Cars, motorbikes, vans, minibuses, buses, coaches and heavy goods vehicles (HGVs) in central London need to meet minimum exhaust emissions standards or pay a daily charge."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
This is in addition to any Congestion Charge or Low Emission Zone (LEZ) charges that may apply.
To pay a Congestion Charge or a ULEZ or LEZ charge:

Phone: 0343 222 2222 ( TfL call charges )
Open: Monday to Friday: 08:00-20:00
Closed on weekends and bank holidays
To pay a PCN for the Congestion Charge, ULEZ, LEZ or red routes:

Phone: 0343 222 3333 ( TfL call charges )
Open: Monday to Friday: 08:00-20:00
Closed on weekends and bank holidays
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Check if your vehicle meets ULEZ or LEZ emissions standards"}
If it doesn't you need to pay to drive within the zone(s).
